question: You have seen an advertisement from a couple, who live in Australia, for someone to teach their two children your language for a year.Write a letter to the couple. In your letterexplain why you think you would be suitable for the jobsay what else you could do for the familygive your reasons for wanting the job
text: I am writing to you in response to your “Telugu Language Teacher” advertisement in the “Indeed” job portal for a period of one year for your two children.

I trust I'll be a suitable candidate for this position as I am currently receiving formal education in Telugu literature. I was born and brought up in Andhra with Telugu as my native language, hence I am fluent in speaking the language as well as reading and writing in it. Besides that, I have had several babysitting jobs on a part-time basis for many years and feel very equipped to take care of children.

I am known to be a passionately traditional cook and I would love to add value to my time with your family by cooking delicious, authentic, and native food. Moreover, I could also tell stories from mythology, and folklore which will help your family build connections with our common cultural heritage.

In addition to my expertise in the language, culture and teaching; my formal education requires me to gain practical experience as part of my course work. Your requirements, therefore, suit my current and future professional goals perfectly.
I hope that my candidacy will be considered seriously.
